parameters.jsCode:
const article = $json.article ?? {};
const metadata = $json.metadata ?? [];
const content = (article.rawText || '').trim();

const ALLOWED_TOPICS = [
  'agentic_ai',
  'model_context_protocol',
  'frontier_models',
  'multimodality',
  'retrieval_augmented_generation',
  'fine_tuning_and_customization',
  'developer_tools_and_frameworks',
  'ai_hardware_and_infrastructure',
  'open_source_ecosystem',
  'enterprise_ai_and_automation',
  'responsible_ai_and_governance'
];

const schemaDescription = `
Return JSON matching:
{
  "title": string,
  "summary": string,
  "topics": string[],
  "topicDecisionRequired": boolean,
  "suggestedTopic": string,
  "tags": string[],
  "entities": [{ "name": string, "entityType": "person|company|project|technology|other" }],
  "ctaText": string,
  "ctaLink": string
}
Rules:
- title/summary must be Ukrainian text (no placeholders).
- topics: choose up to 3 EXACT values from ${ALLOWED_TOPICS.join(', ')}.
- If none apply, return topics=[] and topicDecisionRequired=true, and set suggestedTopic to your best new label (or empty string if truly unsure). Otherwise topics ‚â† [] and topicDecisionRequired=false, suggestedTopic="".
- tags: ‚â§6 lowercase keywords/hashtags, deduplicated.
- entities: only real entities, use the allowed entityType values.
- CTA fields empty when absent.
- Respond with JSON only.`.trim();

const sections = [
  '=== METADATA EXTRACTION TASK ===',
  schemaDescription,
  '',
  '=== ARTICLE CONTENT ===',
  content || '[No text content]',
  '',
  '=== MEDIA CONTEXT ===',
  metadata.length ? metadata.join('\n') : '[No media metadata]',
  '',
  'Generate the JSON per schema with valid UTF-8 and no extra commentary.'
];

return [
  {
    json: {
      ...$json,
      agentPrompt: sections.join('\n'),
    },
  },
];
